topic.title: 1 February 20X2

bodydiv.p: The price per share when the contract is agreed on 1 February 20X2 is CU100. The initial fair value of the forward contract on 1 February 20X2 is zero.

p.i: No entry is required because the fair value of the derivative is zero and no cash is paid or received.
